author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NOAA AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATES THAT ERIN IS NEAR HURRICANE STRENGTH...
summary: ...NOAA AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATES THAT ERIN IS NEAR HURRICANE STRENGTH... As of 8:00 PM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 16.9, -51.9 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NOAA AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATES THAT ERIN IS NEAR HURRICANE STRENGTH... As of 8:00 PM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 16.9, -51.9 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
